detail_desc: Lightweight nylon bomber jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
V-neck body in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short dress in a viscose weave with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs, wide sewn-on ties at the neck and covered buttons on one shoulder. Yoke front and back with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Dress in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons at the front. Diagonal, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Knee-length, V-neck dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. Double-layered yoke with pleats at the top and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt under the bust and a flounce at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a slightly stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
